column4: Latest; Prey Veng province: A horrific fire broke out at Kok Ou market in Kampong Trabek district
column7: and seriously injuring his young sister. Their mother was rescued and sent to hospital after the fire broke out on Wednesday. March 2020.------Sources have not yet identified the cause of the fire
